abort.one_instance_allowed: Nëmmen eng eenzeg Instanz ass néideg.

create_entry.default:
Op Android, an [der OwnTracks App]({android_url}), géi an Preferences -> Connection. Ännert folgend Astellungen:
- Mode: Private HTTP
- Host {webhool_url}
- Identification:
  - Username: `<Your name>`
  - Device ID: `<Your device name>`

Op IOS, an [der OwnTracks App]({ios_url}), klick op (i) Ikon uewen lénks -> Settings. Ännert folgend Astellungen:
- Mode: HTTP
- URL: {webhool_url}
- Turn on authentication:
- UserID: `<Your name>`

{secret}

Kuckt w.e.g. [Dokumentatioun]({docs_url}) fir méi Informatiounen.
